lexUnit.name: agree.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: have the same opinion about something.

sentence.text: No one agrees , for example , on what is " hazardous " waste .
Make sure you agree from the start on whether babysitting is part of her job , and if so how often .

The 44 delegates , drawn from ruling and opposition parties and interest groups , agreed on the need for a United States-style constitution , with an executive president possibly elected by universal suffrage .
I do not agree with his analysis about the Government looking after number one and therefore encouraging people to commit crime .
I agree with what was said about joyriding .
But not everyone agrees about the quality of epoflex .
The attorney agreed with Haydon about the injustice of the proceedings , and told him to return that evening to settle the matter finally .
I agree with him about the irreversibility of the peace process .
I agree with you about a striker though .
Coarse vox man Rikky Turner agrees with my assertion about his native Ashton .
While I agree that worm watching will probably never catch on as a mass pursuit , something well known here in Cornwall is to observe seagulls tap dancing on the lawn after rain .
And all agreed most bitterly , though no one uttered it , that they would be going back derided and disgraced .
Well , they agreed on that much anyway .
I very much agree with my hon. Friend .
I very much agree with those Labour spokesmen who argued in the past that we should look , above all , at pensioners ' net incomes .
It agrees that compulsory treatment in the community is unacceptable , but accepts that the ` revolving door " patient who regularly defaults from treatment presents a genuine problem of management .
Sociologists are not agreed on the relationship between inequality in society at large and inequality within the education system .
` I agree with everything you have said , miss .
MOST people would agree that drug dealing inside Buckingham Palace is a pretty serious crime by any standards .
The ministers agreed on the urgency of the situation .
I agree entirely with the hon. Gentleman .
A smiling Arafat agreed that there was some case for the existence of Israel and ASLEF accepted flexible rostering with far from flexible facial expression .
